alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Leflore (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 02 at 7:34PM CST until February 06 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Sunflower River At Sunflower affecting Sunflower County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yalobusha At Whaley affecting Leflore and Carroll Counties. For the Lower Yazoo ...including Whaley, Greenwood, Belzoni, Yazoo City, Sunflower, Anguilla...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yalobusha At Whaley. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Minor flooding of lowland and agricultural land is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 22.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM CST Thursday was 22.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 23.0 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Yalobusha Whaley 21.0 22.4 Thu 7 pm CST 23.0 21.9 20.8 &&
info.instruction: Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 800 AM CST.
